name: Almake
short_description: This is a group of makefile scripts and templates that helps the developer and end-user to configure, update, and build Allegro/AllegroGL/etc projects, on many platforms, and with different compilers, in a easy way (just type "make" and it will work).

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Developers
